issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Hive webhcat principal configuration optimizationï¼Œwhen you configure:
<property>
    <name>templeton.kerberos.principal</name>
    <value>HTTP/_HOST@<REALM></value>
</property>
The '_HOST' should be replaced by specific host name.

ATTACHMENT ID: 12897949 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build
Unit tests failed not related to the patch,[~lirui],can you plz take a quick review?

The change looks good to me. +1
[~thejas], [~alangates], maybe you also want to take a look.
Pushed to master. Thanks [~linzhangbing] for the contribution.
This jira is resolved and released with Hive 3.0 If you find an issue with it, please create a new jira.
